member.name: COMMCONFIG
member.summary: Contains information about the configuration state of a communications device.

member.name: COMMCONFIG.dwSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes. The caller must set this member to sizeof(COMMCONFIG).

member.name: COMMCONFIG.wVersion
member.summary: The version number of the structure. This parameter can be 1. The version of the provider-specific structure should be included in the wcProviderData member.

member.name: COMMCONFIG.dcb
member.summary: The device-control block () structure for RS-232 serial devices. ADCB structure is always present regardless of the port driver subtype specified in the device's structure.

member.name: COMMCONFIG.dwProviderSubType
member.summary: The type of communications provider, and thus the format of the provider-specific data. For a list of communications provider types, see the description of the structure.

member.name: COMMCONFIG.dwProviderOffset
member.summary: The offset of the provider-specific data relative to the beginning of the structure, in bytes. This member is zero if there is no provider-specific data.

member.name: COMMCONFIG.dwProviderSize
member.summary: The size of the provider-specific data, in bytes.

member.name: COMMCONFIG.wcProviderData
member.summary: Optional provider-specific data. This member can be of any size or can be omitted. Because theCOMMCONFIG structure may be expanded in the future, applications should use the dwProviderOffset member to determine the location of this member.
